member.name: T:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.Company
member.summary: Represents a LinkedIn company.
member.author: Bruno Baia

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.Company.ID
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the company.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.Company.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the company.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.Company.Industry
member.summary:
Gets or sets the industry in which the company operates.
Industry codes: http://developer.linkedin.com/node/1011

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.Company.Size
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of employees at the company.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.Company.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the company is public or private.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.Company.Ticker
member.summary: Gets or sets the stock market name for the company, if the company type is public.

member.name: T:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.Education
member.summary: Represents an education details for a Profile on LinkedIn.
member.author: Bruno Baia

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.Education.ID
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the education entry.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.Education.SchoolName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the school, as indicated by the member.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.Education.StudyField
member.summary: Gets or sets the field of study at the school, as indicated by the member.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.Education.StartDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the year indicating when the education began.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.Education.EndDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the year indicating when the education ended, or when the education is current.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.Education.Degree
member.summary: Gets or sets the degree, if any, received at this institution.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.Education.Activities
member.summary: Gets or sets a value describing activities the member was involved in while a student at this institution.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.Education.Notes
member.summary: Gets or sets other details on the member's studies.

member.name: T:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.ImAccount
member.summary: Represents an IM (Instant Messenger) account details for a profile on LinkedIn.
member.author: Bruno Baia

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.ImAccount.Type
member.summary:
Gets or sets the type of IM account.
Possible values are: aim, gtalk, icq, msn, skype, and yahoo.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.ImAccount.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the IM account.

member.summary: Base class for LinkedIn operations.

member.name: T:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInDate
member.summary: Represents a LinkedIn Date which just contains year, month and day.
member.author: Robert Drysdale
Bruno Baia

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInDate.Year
member.summary: Gets or sets the year component of the date, if provided.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInDate.Month
member.summary: Gets or sets the month component of the date, if provided.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInDate.Day
member.summary: Gets or sets the day component of the date, if provided.

member.name: T:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInFullProfile
member.summary: Represents a LinkedIn full user's profile information.
member.author: Bruno Baia
Robert Drysdale

member.name: T:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInProfile
member.summary: Represents a LinkedIn user's profile information.
member.author: Craig Walls
Bruno Baia (.NET)

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInProfile.ID
member.summary: Gets or sets the user's LinkedIn ID.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInProfile.FirstName
member.summary: Gets or sets the user's first name.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInProfile.LastName
member.summary: Gets or sets the user's last name.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInProfile.Headline
member.summary: Gets or sets the user's headline.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInProfile.Industry
member.summary: Gets or sets the user's industry.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInProfile.PictureUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets a URL to the user's profile picture.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInProfile.Summary
member.summary: Gets or sets the user's summary.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInProfile.PublicProfileUrl
member.summary:
Gets or sets a URL to the user's public profile.
The content shown at this profile is intended for public display and is determined by the user's privacy settings.
May be null if the user's profile isn't public.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInProfile.StandardProfileUrl
member.summary:
Gets or sets a URL to the user's authenticated profile.
Requires a login to be viewed, unlike public profile url and the content shown at this profile will depend upon what the requesting user is allowed to see.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInProfile.AuthToken
member.summary: Gets or sets an authentication token required by some API calls.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInFullProfile.Positions
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of positions a member has had.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInFullProfile.ThreeCurrentPositions
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of positions a member currently holds, limited to three.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInFullProfile.ThreePastPositions
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of positions a member formerly held, limited to the three most recent

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInFullProfile.Recommendations
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of recommendations a member has received.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInFullProfile.ImAccounts
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of instant messenger accounts.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInFullProfile.TwitterAccounts
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of Twitter accounts.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInFullProfile.UrlResources
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of URLs the member has chosen to share on their LinkedIn profile.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInFullProfile.PhoneNumbers
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of phone numbers.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInFullProfile.Skills
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of skills held by this member.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInFullProfile.Educations
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of education institutions a member has attended.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInFullProfile.ProposalComments
member.summary: Gets or sets the short-form text area describing how the member approaches proposals.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInFullProfile.Specialties
member.summary: Gets or sets the short-form text area where the member enumerates their specialties.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInFullProfile.ConnectionsCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of connections the member has.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInFullProfile.IsConnectionsCountCapped
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the number of connections has been capped at 500.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInFullProfile.RecommendersCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of recommendations the member has.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInFullProfile.MainAddress
member.summary: Gets or sets the member's main address. Could be home, work, etc.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInFullProfile.Associations
member.summary: Gets or sets the short-form text area enumerating the associations a member has.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInFullProfile.Location
member.summary: Gets or sets the generic name of the location of the LinkedIn member.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInFullProfile.CountryCode
member.summary: Gets or sets the country code (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 standard) for the LinkedIn member.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInFullProfile.Interests
member.summary: Gets or sets the short-form text area describing the member's interests.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInFullProfile.Honors
member.summary: Gets or sets a short-form text area describing what Honors the member may have.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInFullProfile.Distance
member.summary: Gets or sets the degree distance of the fetched profile from the member who fetched the profile.
member.remarks:
Possible values are:
description>0: the member
1, 2, and 3: # of degrees apart
-1: out of network
100: share a group, but not within 3 degrees (will get 1-3 instead)

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInFullProfile.BirthDate
member.summary:
Gets or sets the member's birth date.
May return only month and day, but not year, or all three, depending on information provided.

member.name: T:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInProfiles
member.summary: Represents the results of a LinkedIn profile search.
member.author: Bruno Baia

member.name: T:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.PaginatedResult
member.summary: Abstract class for paginated result sets.
member.author: Bruno Baia

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.PaginatedResult.Start
member.summary:
Gets or sets the start location within the result set for paginated returns.
This is the zero-based ordinal number of the search return, not the number of the page.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.PaginatedResult.Count
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of results to return.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.PaginatedResult.Total
member.summary: Gets or sets the total number of results available.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInProfiles.Profiles
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of matching s.

member.name: T:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInUrl
member.summary: Represents a LinkedIn URL.
member.author: Bruno Baia

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInUrl.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the label given to the URL by the member.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.LinkedInUrl.Url
member.summary: Gets or sets the resource URL.

member.name: T:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.PhoneNumber
member.summary: Represents a LinkedIn phone number.
member.author: Bruno Baia

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.PhoneNumber.Type
member.summary:
Gets or sets the type of phone number.
Possible values are: home, work, and mobile.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.PhoneNumber.Number
member.summary: Gets or sets the phone number.

member.name: T:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.Position
member.summary: Represents a LinkedIn user's position.
member.author: Bruno Baia

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.Position.ID
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the position.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.Position.Company
member.summary: Gets or sets the company the member works for.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.Position.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the job title held at the position, as indicated by the member.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.Position.Summary
member.summary: Gets or sets the summary of the member's position.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.Position.IsCurrent
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the member currently holds that position.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.Position.StartDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the with month and year fields indicating when the position began.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.Position.EndDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the with month and year fields indicating when the position ended.

member.name: T:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.ProfileSort
member.summary: Defines the profile search result order.
member.author: Bruno Baia

member.name: F:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.ProfileSort.Connections
member.summary: Number of connections per person, from largest to smallest. Default value.

member.name: F:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.ProfileSort.Recommenders
member.summary: Number of recommendations per person, from largest to smallest.

member.name: F:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.ProfileSort.Distance
member.summary: Degree of separation within the member's network, from first degree, then second degree, and then all others mixed together, including third degree and out-of-network.

member.name: F:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.ProfileSort.Relevance
member.summary: Relevance of results based on the query, from most to least relevant.

member.name: T:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.Recommendation
member.summary: Represents a LinkedIn recommendation.
member.author: Bruno Baia

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.Recommendation.ID
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the recommendation.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.Recommendation.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the recommendation text.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.Recommendation.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of recommendation that was selected by the person making the recommendation.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.Recommendation.Recommender
member.summary: Gets or sets the person who made the recommendation.

member.name: T:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.RecommendationType
member.summary: Represents LinkedIn types of recommendation.
member.author: Bruno Baia

member.name: F:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.RecommendationType.BusinessPartner
member.summary: Business partner.

member.name: F:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.RecommendationType.Colleague
member.summary: Colleague.

member.name: F:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.RecommendationType.Education
member.summary: Education.

member.name: F:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.RecommendationType.ServiceProvider
member.summary: Service provider.

member.name: F:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.RecommendationType.Unknown
member.summary: Not defined.

member.name: T:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.SearchParameters
member.summary: Represents profile search parameters.
member.author: Robert Drysdale
Bruno Baia

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.SearchParameters.Keywords
member.summary: Gets or sets the space delimited keywords.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.SearchParameters.FirstName
member.summary: Gets or sets the first name to match exactly.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.SearchParameters.LastName
member.summary: Gets or sets the last name to match exactly.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.SearchParameters.CompanyName
member.summary:
Gets or sets the company name to match.
Can be combined with the IsCurrentCompany property to specify whether the person is or is not still working at the company.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.SearchParameters.IsCurrentCompany
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to match members who currently work at the company specified in the CompanyName property.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.SearchParameters.Title
member.summary:
Gets or sets the profile title to match.
Can be combined with the IsCurrentTitle property to specify whether the member currently or once had that title.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.SearchParameters.IsCurrentTitle
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to match members who currently or once had the title specified in the Title property.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.SearchParameters.SchoolName
member.summary:
Gets or sets the school name to match.
Can be combined with the IsCurrentSchool property to specify whether the member is or is not still at the school.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.SearchParameters.IsCurrentSchool
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to match members who currently attend the school specified in the SchoolName property.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.SearchParameters.CountryCode
member.summary:
Gets or sets the location in a specific country to match.
Values are defined in by ISO 3166 standard.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.SearchParameters.PostalCode
member.summary:
Gets or sets the postal code to match.
Can be combined with the CountryCode property (Not supported for all countries).

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.SearchParameters.Distance
member.summary:
Gets or sets the distance (in miles) from a central point to match.
This is best used in combination with both CountryCode and PostalCode properties.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.SearchParameters.Start
member.summary:
Gets or sets the start location within the result set for paginated returns.
This is the zero-based ordinal number of the search return, not the number of the page.
The default value is 0.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.SearchParameters.Count
member.summary:
Gets or sets the number of profiles to return. Values can range between 0 and 25.
The default value is 10.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.SearchParameters.Sort
member.summary: Gets or sets the profile search result order.

member.name: T:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.ICommunicationOperations
member.summary: Interface defining the operations for sending messages and sending connect invitations to other users on LinkedIn.
member.author: Robert Drysdale
Bruno Baia (.NET)

member.name: M:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.ICommunicationOperations.SendMessageAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Asynchronously sends a textual message to a recipient specified by its ID.
member.param: The subject of the message.
The body or text of the message (does not support html).
The recipient ID.
member.returns: A Task that represents the asynchronous operation.
member.exception: If there is an error while communicating with LinkedIn.

member.name: M:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.ICommunicationOperations.SendMessageAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Asynchronously sends a textual message to a list of recipients specified by their ID.
member.param: The subject of the message.
The body or text of the message (does not support html).
The list of recipient IDs. At least one.
member.returns: A Task that represents the asynchronous operation.
member.exception: If there is an error while communicating with LinkedIn.

member.name: M:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.ICommunicationOperations.ConnectToAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Asynchronously sends a connect invitation message to recipient ID.
member.param: The subject of the invitation message.
The body or text of the invitation message (does not support html).
The recipient ID.
The recipient additional authorization token returned when performing a search.
member.returns: A Task that represents the asynchronous operation.
member.exception: If there is an error while communicating with LinkedIn.

member.name: M:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.ICommunicationOperations.ConnectToAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Asynchronously sends a connect invitation message to an email (for users not on LinkedIn).
member.param: The subject of the invitation message.
The body or text of the invitation message (does not support html).
The email address of the recipient.
The first name of the recipient.
The last name of the recipient.
member.returns: A Task that represents the asynchronous operation.
member.exception: If there is an error while communicating with LinkedIn.

member.summary: Implementation of , providing a binding to LinkedIn's connections-oriented REST resources.

Bruno Baia (.NET)

member.name: T:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.IConnectionOperations
member.summary: Interface defining the operations for retrieving authenticated user's connections.
member.author: Robert Drysdale
Bruno Baia (.NET)

member.name: M:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.IConnectionOperations.GetConnectionsAsync
member.summary: Asynchronously retrieves up to 500 of the 1st-degree connections from the authenticated user's network.
member.returns: A Task that represents the asynchronous operation that can return a object representing the user's connections.
member.exception: If there is an error while communicating with LinkedIn.

member.name: M:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.IConnectionOperations.GetConnectionsAsync(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Asynchronously retrieves the 1st-degree connections from the authenticated user's network.
member.param: The starting location in the result set. Used with count for pagination.
The number of connections to return. The maximum value is 500. Used with start for pagination.
member.returns: A Task that represents the asynchronous operation that can return a object representing the user's connections.
member.exception: If there is an error while communicating with LinkedIn.

member.name: M:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.IConnectionOperations.GetNetworkStatisticsAsync
member.summary: Asynchronously retrieves network statistics for the authenticated user.
member.returns: A Task that represents the asynchronous operation that can return a that contains count of 1st-degree and second degree connections.
member.exception: If there is an error while communicating with LinkedIn.

member.summary: Interface specifying a basic set of operations for interacting with LinkedIn.

Robert Drysdale
Bruno Baia (.NET)

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.ILinkedIn.CommunicationOperations
member.summary: Gets the portion of the LinkedIn API sending messages and connection requests.

member.summary: Gets the portion of the LinkedIn API retrieving connections.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.ILinkedIn.ProfileOperations
member.summary: Gets the portion of the LinkedIn API retrieving and performing operations on profiles.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.ILinkedIn.RestOperations
member.summary: Gets the underlying object allowing for consumption of LinkedIn endpoints that may not be otherwise covered by the API binding.
member.remarks: The object returned is configured to include an OAuth "Authorization" header on all requests.

member.name: M:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.Impl.LinkedInTemplate.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Create a new instance of .
member.param: The application's API key.
The application's API secret.
An access token acquired through OAuth authentication with LinkedIn.
An access token secret acquired through OAuth authentication with LinkedIn.

member.name: M:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.Impl.LinkedInTemplate.ConfigureRestTemplate(Spring.Rest.Client.RestTemplate)
member.summary: Enables customization of the used to consume provider API resources.
member.remarks: An example use case might be to configure a custom error handler. Note that this method is called after the RestTemplate has been configured with the message converters returned from GetMessageConverters().
member.param: The RestTemplate to configure.

member.name: M:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.Impl.LinkedInTemplate.GetMessageConverters
member.summary: Returns a list of s to be used by the internal .
member.remarks: This implementation adds and to the default list.
member.returns: The list of s to be used by the internal .

member.name: M:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.Impl.LinkedInTemplate.GetJsonMessageConverter
member.summary:
Returns a to be used by the internal .
Override to customize the message converter (for example, to set a custom object mapper or supported media types).

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.Impl.LinkedInTemplate.CommunicationOperations
member.summary: Gets the portion of the LinkedIn API sending messages and connection requests.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.Impl.LinkedInTemplate.ConnectionOperations
member.summary: Gets the portion of the LinkedIn API retrieving connections.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.Impl.LinkedInTemplate.ProfileOperations
member.summary: Gets the portion of the LinkedIn API retrieving and performing operations on profiles.

member.summary: Gets the underlying object allowing for consumption of LinkedIn endpoints that may not be otherwise covered by the API binding.
member.remarks: The object returned is configured to include an OAuth "Authorization" header on all requests.

member.summary: Asynchronously retrieves the authenticated user's LinkedIn profile details.

member.exception: If there is an error while communicating with LinkedIn.

member.name: M:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.IProfileOperations.GetUserProfileByIdAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Asynchronously retrieves a specific user's LinkedIn profile details by its ID.
member.param: The user ID for the user whose details are to be retrieved.
member.returns: A Task that represents the asynchronous operation that can return a object representing the user's profile.

member.name: M:Spring.Social.LinkedIn.Api.IProfileOperations.GetUserProfileByPublicUrlAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Asynchronously retrieves a specific user's LinkedIn profile details by its public url.
member.param: The user public url for the user whose details are to be retrieved.
member.returns: A Task that represents the asynchronous operation that can return a object representing the user's profile.
member.exception: If there is an error while communicating with LinkedIn.
